Detailed Description

Represent a version of a XML Configuration file. The file version has the form VXX.XX-XX. The version can also have a special edition number.

int ConfigurationVersion::build (  )  const

Return the build part of the version (or called special edition).

Returns:
An integer represents the special edition number

bool ConfigurationVersion::isValid (  )  const

Test if a version is valid. A version is valid only if major, minor, and release number are greater than zero.

Returns:
true if the version is valid, else return false.

QString ConfigurationVersion::toString (  )  const

Return a string a representation of the version. The string has the form : VXX.XX-XX (XX) where the number in bracket is the special edition number. This is not necessary and can be omited, if not specified.

Returns:
A string representation of the version.
